practicality.note: Limited applicability to real systems due to specific setup.

novelty.note: Introduces new concepts but overlaps with existing work.

internal_consistency.note: Some logical inconsistencies noted, particularly in definitions.

cross_section_consistency.note: Inconsistencies in claims and evidence across sections.

claim_calibration.note: Claims exceed evidence, lacking statistical support.

reproducibility.note: Use of fictional models hinders reproducibility.

future_orientation.note: Points to interesting future directions but needs more grounding.

writing_quality.note: Generally well-written but dense in places.

academic_contribution.note: Contributes to the field but not significantly beyond existing theories.

citation_quality.note: References are appropriate but could be more comprehensive.
